thread.title: Federated Premier Municipal Income Fund Reports Annual Earnings

author: cnbc.com
title: Federated Premier Municipal Income Fund Reports Annual Earnings
text:
PITTSBURGH, Jan. 31, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Federated Premier Municipal Income Fund (NYSE: FMN) today announced earnings for the fiscal year ended Nov. 30, 2017. The fund seeks to provide investors with income that is exempt from federal income tax, including alternative minimum tax (AMT), by investing in municipal securities from different sectors, states and issuers across the country.
For the fiscal year ended Nov. 30, 2017, FMN had net investment income of $5.02 million or $0.79 per common share 1 . From this amount, FMN paid dividends on auction market preferred shares (AMPS) of $0.20 million, resulting in net investment income after the AMPS dividends of $4.82 million or $0.76 per common share. Net realized and unrealized gains were $2.08 million or $0.43 per common share. At Nov. 30, 2017, FMN had an undistributed net investment income reserve of $0.022 per common share, up from $0.002 per common share at Nov. 30, 2016. At Nov. 30, 2017, total portfolio assets of FMN were $287.7 million and the net asset value per common share outstanding on that date was $15.04.
FMN has paid a monthly tax-free dividend since the first dividend declaration in February 2003.
Fund composition and performance data for the fund as of Dec. 31, 2017 are available in the Products section of FederatedInvestors.com . Data is updated on the website approximately 15 days following each month-end and full portfolio listings are updated approximately 30 days following each calendar quarter-end. To order hard copies or to be placed on a mailing list, call 800-245-0242 x5587538, email CEinfo@federatedinv.com or write to Federated Investors, 1001 Liberty Avenue, Floor 23, Pittsburgh, PA 15222.
Federated Investors, Inc. (NYSE: FII) is one of the largest investment managers , managing $397.6 billion in assets as of Dec. 31, 2017. With 108 funds, as well as a variety of separately managed account options, Federated provides comprehensive investment management worldwide to more than 8,500 institutions and intermediaries including corporations, government entities, insurance companies, foundations and endowments, banks and broker/dealers. For more information, visit FederatedInvestors.com .
###
1) Except where noted, per share numbers are based on the average number of common shares outstanding during the fiscal year.
